author: jdixl

changelog.release_notes:
Make the most of the health data hiding on your pebble round.

Displays step count and typical step count as soon as they are updated. As a bonus this watch face also displays the time, battery level and Bluetooth indicator.

Careful consideration has been taken to ensure the watch face is super readable.

Enjoy!

title: Step by step round
